newsitem.title: CHINA: China Sept retail prices up 5 pct yr/yr - Xinhua.
newsitem.headline: China Sept retail prices up 5 pct yr/yr - Xinhua.

text.p: China's retail prices rose a year-on-year 5.0 percent in September, the official Xinhua news agency said on Thursday. The rise compared with a 5.8 percent year-on-year increase in August.
Retail prices were up 6.6 percent in the January-September period compared with the same months last year, the agency said.
It gave few details of the latest figures, saying only that prices of fresh vegetables remained high in some areas.
It quoted officials as saying that stronger supervision of vegetable prices was needed and that price readjustments should be strictly controlled. No further details were given.
